.. _spkg_anyio:

anyio: High level compatibility layer for multiple asynchronous event loop implementations
==========================================================================================

Description
-----------

High level compatibility layer for multiple asynchronous event loop implementations

License
-------

----------------

Type
----

standard

- :ref:`spkg_idna`
- :ref:`spkg_pip`
- :ref:`spkg_sniffio`
